about_the_game:
*In order to use this content, the Base Game (sold separately) is required. You may need to apply the latest patch before using this product.

*The Team Pass 1, which includes ""KOF XV DLC Characters 'Team GAROU'"" and ""KOF XV DLC Characters 'Team SOUTH TOWN'"", is also available. Please be careful not to make duplicate purchases.

[Product Contents]
Geese Howard, Billy Kane, and Ryuji Yamazaki of ""Team SOUTH TOWN"" can be used in THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
